text: Znayte, chto sredi vas nakhoditsya Poslannik Allakha. Yesli by on podchinyalsya vam vo mnogikh delakh, to vy nepremenno popali by v zatrudnitel'noye polozheniye. No Allakh privil vam lyubov' k vere, i predstavil yeye prekrasnoy vashim serdtsam, i sdelal nenavistnymi vam neveriye, nechestiye i nepovinoveniye. Takovy idushchiye pravym putem
